data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Bongaigaon, Assam, India from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Bongaigaon, Assam, India

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Bongaigaon, Assam, India to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the county of Bongaigaon to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Bongaigaon who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Father, I pray that the Mahara people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Mahara people know you.
Jesus, please send your Spirit to Bongaigaon, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Bongaigaon, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.

data.section_summary:
the county of Bongaigaon, Assam, India has a population of 738,800.

We estimate Bongaigaon has 8,127 people who might know Jesus, 8,964 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 721,709 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the county of Bongaigaon to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.

location.name: Bongaigaon
